SEARCH
Package service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
The UserService class provides methods for managing users, including finding, updating, and removing users across different user roles (patients, doctors, pharmacists, administrators, and nurses).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Natalyn Pong

      Parameters:
      administratorRepository - Repository for managing administrators.
      pharmacistRepository - Repository for managing pharmacists.
      doctorRepository - Repository for managing doctors.
      patientRepository - Repository for managing patients.
      nurseRepository - Repository for managing nurses.

  • Method Details

    • findOne

      public User findOne(String id, boolean findNonStaff, boolean findStaff)
      Finds a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to find.
      findNonStaff - A flag indicating whether to search for non-staff users (patients).
      findStaff - A flag indicating whether to search for staff users.
      Returns:
      The user if found, or null otherwise.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user)
      Updates a user's information in the appropriate repository based on their role.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update.

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(User user)
      Removes a user from the appropriate repository based on their role.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to remove.

    • determineRole

      public UserRole determineRole(User user)
      Determines the role of a given user based on their class type.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose role is to be determined.
      Returns:
      The UserRole of the user.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the user type is unknown.
